com.frankly.franklysdk.model.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleParcelable
      • com.frankly.franklysdk.model.StoredObject
        • com.frankly.franklysdk.model.message.Message
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageMessage, StickerMessage, TextMessage

    public abstract class Message
extends StoredObject
    Data sent from one user to one or more other users.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Message.Status
      The states that a Message can be in.
      static class  Message.Type
      The types of Messages supported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(Long id,
               Long version,
               Long roomId,
               Long roomMessageId,
               Long senderId,
               Boolean sticky,
               Message.Status status,
               Date sentOn,
               Date modifiedOn)
        Creates a new Message.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier of this message.
        version - The numerical value used to determine which instance of a message is most up-to-date.
        roomId - The ID of the room that this message was sent in.
        roomMessageId - The ID of this message within the scope of its room.
        senderId - The ID of the user that sent this message.
        sticky - Whether this message is classified as a sticky message.
        status - The state that this message is in.
        sentOn - The date and time that this message was sent on.
        modifiedOn - The date and time that this message was most recently modified.
